description: Manages a Load Balancer L7 Policy resource within HuaweiCloud.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Action.description:
The L7 Policy action - can either be REDIRECT\_TO\_POOL,
or REDIRECT\_TO\_LISTENER. Changing this creates a new L7 Policy.

AdminStateUp.description:
The administrative state of the L7 Policy.
This value can only be true (UP).

Description.description: Human-readable description for the L7 Policy.

ListenerId.description:
The Listener on which the L7 Policy will be associated with.
Changing this creates a new L7 Policy.

Name.description:
Human-readable name for the L7 Policy. Does not have
to be unique.

Position.description: The position of this policy on the listener. Positions start at 1. Changing this creates a new L7 Policy.

RedirectListenerId.description: Requests matching this policy will be redirected to the listener with this ID. Only valid if action is REDIRECT\_TO\_LISTENER.

RedirectPoolId.description:
Requests matching this policy will be redirected to the
pool with this ID. Only valid if action is REDIRECT\_TO\_POOL.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.
A Networking client is needed to create an . If omitted, the
`region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
L7 Policy.

TenantId.description:
Required for admins. The UUID of the tenant who owns
the L7 Policy.  Only administrative users can specify a tenant UUID
other than their own. Changing this creates a new L7 Policy.
